body:
Hey I'm having trouble getting my profile statistics to load, in fact they never have loaded for me. I've tried using different browsers and logging out an back in numerous times. This is what it looks like:
 I once kept this page open for an hour or two and still it never loads. I have no problem viewing other players profile stats as shown:

title: Profile Help

replies.body: It happens to me as well, you just have to keep refreshing it.
replies.body_tagged: It happens to me as well, you just have to keep refreshing it.

reply_to.body: It happens to me as well, you just have to keep refreshing it.
reply_to.body_tagged: It happens to me as well, you just have to keep refreshing it.

replies.body: Well, it's a website bug. Every new player that joined in the last 3-4 months gets this. If you want to see your kills, deaths and KD, do this and report it at github. It could be fixed in the next hours :D
replies.body_tagged: Well, it's a website bug. Every new player that joined in the last 3-4 months gets this. If you want to see your kills, deaths and KD, do this and report it at github. It could be fixed in the next hours :D

its not not much but:
